Vice President of Marketing at Infineta Systems.

John Oh is responsible for driving all of Infinetaâ€™s outbound marketing. Most recently, John served as consulting Vice President of Marketing at FireEye where he led the corporate and product marketing for the anti-malware security startup. He was Vice President of Marketing at Radiance (now Comcast Media) where he drove new applications from concept to customer adoption. At Citrix Systems, John was Director of Product Communications responsible for driving category leadership for all enterprise-class product lines. He joined Citrix through its $325M acquisition of NetScaler where, as Director of Customer Marketing and Corporate Communications, he rapidly established the startup as a leader in a market category he helped develop from the beginning, Application Delivery. Earlier, John held senior roles in marketing and PR for companies large and small including Oblix (now Oracle), Samsung, and Edelman. His career in technology sales and marketing began at MAI Systems (now Softbrands) where he held positions in marketing and major account sales. John studied physics at U.C. Berkeley.
